attacks.name: Poisonpowder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Pollen Shield
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, Bayleef can't become Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned. (All other effects of attacks, Pokémon Powers, and Trainer cards still happen.)
